name: Music Animation Machine Score
summary: A MAMX file is a musical score saved in the Music Animation Machine format. It contains plain text data that Music Animation Machine uses to show and play a piece of music. Music Animation Machine users typically create MAMX files from .MIDI files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: MAMX file open in Music Animation Machine
images.alt: MAMX file open in Music Animation Machine
